lines.text: Hey how am I driving, man?
I think we're parked.
Man, what is in this shit, man?
Mostly Maui Waui man, but it's got some Labrador in it.
What's Labrador?
It's dog shit.
What?
Yeah, my dog ate my stash, man.
Yeah?
I had it on the table and the little motherfucker ate it, man. Then I had to follow him around with a little baggie for three days, man, before I got it back. Really blew the dog's mind, ya know?
You mean we're smokin' dog shit, man?
Gets ya high, don't it?
[Song, "Rockin' Robin" plays... ]
I think it's even better than before, you know?
Uhhh, I wonder what Great Dane tastes like, man.
So, how long you've been in Mexico?
A week. I mean a day.
Well, which is it? A week or a day?
A weekday.
You wanna get high man?
Does Howdy Doody got wooden Balls man?

[to wife, off camera]
Sweetheart, I'll talk to him.
[to Anthony, "Man", as he makes a fruit smoothie]
Son, your mother and me would like for you to cozy up to the Finkelstein boy. He's a bright kid, and, uh... he's going to military school, and... remember, he was an Eagle Scout...
Arnold...

[shouting as wife continues]
Will you shut up? We're not going to have a family brawl!
...and a retard!
We've put up with a hell of a lot.
[Anthony starts blender]
Can this wait? Build your goddamn muscles, huh? You know, you could build your muscles picking strawberries. You know, bend and scoop... like the Mexicans.
[Anthony turns off blender and pours contents into tall glass]
Shit, maybe I could get you a job with United Fruit! I got a buddy with United Fruit. Get you started. Start with strawberries, you might work your way up to these goddamn bananas!
[Anthony drinks from glass as his father shouts]
When, boy? When... are you going to get your act together?
[Anthony turns to him and gives a loud belch]

[in disgust]
Gross!

[rubs his forehead with his hand]
Oh, good God Almighty me. I think he's the Antichrist.
[turns to his son]
Anthony, I want to talk to you. Now, listen!
[Anthony walks away and gives an obscene gesture behind his back]
Don't walk away from me when I'm talking to you! You get a goddamn job before sundown...

[pointing to Anthony as he walks away]
Is that some kind of peace sign?
...or we're shipping you off to military school with that... goddamn Finkelstein... shit kid!
[turns away in frustration]
Son of a BITCH!
Sir, could I please see your license?
Whuut?
Your license. Where's your license?
It's back there on the bumper, man!
No, I mean your DRIVER'S license.
Oh yeah, I got the bullshit back here man...
[gets license with great difficulty]
Hey I thought'a somethin' really funny, man... Your mother!
[laughs]

[after dirty look, of course]
Sir, what's your name?
uuhhh... Isn't in on the license, man? Yeah, that's it! Pedro De Pacas, man, that's my name...
Hey, hey don't take those, man.
...Wha?
I almost gave you the wrong shit, man.
Hey, man, I already took 'em, man.

[laughing in astonishment]
Hoo hoo hoo hoo hoo hoo hoo hoo hoo hoo hoo...
Hey, whaddaya mean "ho ho ho ho ho"?
Oh... HU-WOW, MAN!
Hey, what was in that shit, man?
You just ate the most acid I've ever seen anybody eat in my life!
Hey, man, I never had no acid before, man.
Jeez, I hope you're not busy for about a month...
Hey I've seen those guys walking around my neighborhood that took too much acid, man. The one guy, his head's swelled up like a pumpkin...

[referring to the acid Pedro took]
No, that's good acid, man.
Another time, there was this guy...

[on police radio]
Hello, hello, hello, hello, hello, can you hear me?
Hello, headquarters? Hello, headquarters? Come in, headquarters. This is Officer Clive... we are...
Use the codename! The codename!
Headquarters, headquarters come in, please. The is Codename Hardhead.
Hat! Hardhat! Give me that! Hello, radio dispatch? This is Codename Hardhat, Codename Hardhat, do you read me? Over.
Was that Lardass?
Hardhat! Codename Hardhat! Do you read, radio dispatch?
Hey, I got somethin' for ya, Lardass!
Hardhat! Hard... Hat! Do you understand?
Lardass, Lardass!
Hardhat! Radio dispatch, do you know who this is?
Naw, who is this is?
This is Sergeant Stedenko!
Oh yeah, you know who this is?
No!
Bye-bye, Lardass!

[Cheech starts toking on the giant joint]
Toke, toke it up, man!

[Cheech starts choking]
Kinda grabs ya' by the boo-boo, don't it?
I been smoking since I was born, man, I can smoke anything, man. You know like I smoke that Michoacán, and Acapulco Gold, man. I even smoke that tied stick, you know?
"Tied stick"?
Yeah, you know that stuff that's tied to a stick.
Ohh, THAI stick.
[stoned cop walks up to the van, where Pedro and Man have been trying to switch who's driving]
What do you guys want?
Nothing.
Hey, do you mind if I have a, bite of your hot dog?
Huh? No man, here, take the whole thing.
[the cop takes a huge bite]
Want some fritos?

[through a mouthful of hot dog]
no, this is fine! Thank you! Hey, you fellas have a nice day, okay?
Hey man, what was that dude's trip? I mean what was he on, man?
Man, I don't know but I wish we had some of it!
[after picking up Man, Pedro guns his car and takes off down the street]
Ohhh! Ohhh!
Hey, how far you goin' man?

[points to the curb]
Hey, right here would be fine, man!
What, you're not afraid of a little speed, are ya man?
Wha, you got some speed, man?
Huh? Speed? Oh, no, I don't got no speed man. But you know what I do got? I got a joint man!
Oh, wow.

[gets it out and hands it to Man]
Here, light that thing up man, let's get chinese-eyed.

[eying the joint]
Kinda skinny, isn't it?
No, it's a heavy duty joint, man.
Kinda looks like a toothpick.
Naw, it's not a toothpick, man.
No, it IS a toothpick, man.
[hands it back to Pedro]

[looking at it, puzzled]
it IS a toothpick!... wait a minute man, I got the shit right here.
[feels around in his pocket]
huh... no, that's my dick.
[feels around some more]
, okay, here you go, man.
[hands a skinny, curled up joint to Man]

[looking at a dinky little joint]
Jeez, I hope your dick's bigger than this, man.
Hey man, you want to get out and walk, man?
Dear God, almighty me... I think he's the Antichrist.
Sgt. Stedenko what are you exactly looking for?
Dope, drugs, weed, grass, toot, smack, quackers, uppers, downers, all arounders. You name it we want it!
The only kind of meat a priest could eat on Friday was nun.
It's punk rock, Man! We can do that; we can be punks, Man!
[Man has disguised himself as a woman while hitchhiking]
Hey, man; I'm glad you picked me up, man. I slept in a ditch last night, man, I was about to freeze my balls off, man.
Man, I didn't even know you had any, I wouldn't of stopped.

[to Pedro, who is in the throes of panic]
HEY! MELLOW OUT, MAN!
Don't worry, man. Those aren't narcs, they're Las Emigras; you know, the Immigration Service looking for illegal aliens.
What's the Immigration Service doing here, man?

My cousin needed a ride to his brother's wedding in Tijuana; so he called the Emigras, man. They'll deport the entire wedding party, man. They get a free bus ride across the border and lunch. When the wedding is over, man, they'll just come back across the border.
This shit is so bad, it'll put a hump on a camel's back.
You get yourself a job before sundown, or we're shipping you off to military school with that goddam Finklestein shit kid! Son of a bitch!

[Discovered, roach on an ashtray]
El roacho.
This is Toyota Kawasaki here at the Mexican-United States border.
Now just how well do you know that freak with the basketball?
Which basketball?
Which basketball?
Man my legs hurt.
Yeah I bet!
Yeah, that 'Nam grass will fuck anyone up, man!
Ahhh, look at that man, the great outdoors, huh!
Yeah, the great outdoors...
[gives Strawberry a weird look]

[laughing while stoned]
Way anchor! How much does it weigh? I don't know, I forgot! pffhhh! Ha ha I saw that in a movie once...!

[to Man]
Sir, what's your name?
Whut? I told you my name, man!

[to Man]
Sir... what's YOUR name?

[to Man]
Hey man! The dude wants to know your name, man!
[Man vomits onto the floor of the car]
Uuhhh - His name is RAALLLPH, man!
No, hey man, if we're gonna wear uniforms man, you know let's have everybody wear something different.
Yea, that's it. Yea, we want something wear everybody wears something different man, but the same, you know?
When, boy? When, are you gonna get your act together?
Some asshole pissed on my leg!
